page.title: 15Shopper Survey in Salterton
page.content: On Monday the 10th June 1985 we interviewed 52 people shopping in Salterton High Street. {How often do you shop here ? Everyday-20 3 times a week -5 Twice a week-3 Not often-3 Tourists-21 {Where else do you shop ? Exeter-17 Exmouth-16 Tourists-19 {How did you get to the High Street? Car-24 Walk-23 Bus-3 Coach-1 Bicycle-1 {Do you like shopping here? { }Yes-47 No-5 {Would you like to see a wider variety {of shops ? { }Yes-15 No-37 {Have you any suggestions about changes {to the High Street? No-47 More pubs-1 A laundrette-1 More buses-1 A Marks and Spensers-1 Free parking for pensioners-1
